attributes.action: Allow English to be a recognised Nationality on official documentation and Census
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the UK only the English are excluded from an individual right to claim their Nationality - Scott, Welsh and Irish together with most non UK citizens can use their place of birth as there Nationality where as the English are only permitted to claim that they are British

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
